humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there are 18 lymph nodes examined, and 2 of them are positive for metastatic carcinoma. This corresponds to N1 stage based on the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12: N1 indicates metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 18 lymph nodes examined, with 2 out of 18 positive for metastatic carcinoma. This indicates that the patient has cancer that has spread to at least one axillary lymph node, but not to the ipsilateral internal mammary lymph nodes or the ipsilateral supraclavicular lymph nodes. This corresponds to a pathologic N1 stage.
